str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To have come, be present, have arrived. A primary verb; to arrive, i.e. Be present.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To delay, tarry, linger, spend time. From chronos; to take time, i.e. Linger.
